title: MEnv (Struct)
text:
TYPE MEnv : STRUCT
The environment that is passed to each instance.

rows.Name: rmps
rows.Comment: The RMP messge service. 0 if RMP communication is disabled.

rows.Name: prsman
rows.Comment: The persistence manager if created, 0 otherwise.

rows.Name: exts
rows.Comment: Extenders possibly provided by other composer plugins.ATTENTION: Returned externder FBs might be not initialized properly (depending on activated generators, etc.)

rows.Name: visus
rows.Comment: Pointer to the AC_Visu_FBs for frame changing.ATTENTION: This pointer may be 0 (meaning that i.e. no visus were generated)
